item.title: L3Harris Hones Defense Department Focus with Sale of Civil Space Propulsion Unit
item.description: AE Industrial will take a 60 percent stake in the new business focused on civil and commercial space; L3Harris will maintain about a 40 percent share.

item.title: Saks Global CEO Exits As Troubled Retailer Eyes $1 Billion To Keep Running
item.description: The company is expected to file for bankruptcy within weeks.

item.title: 150 Aircraft, Cyber Effects and ‘Overwhelming Force:’ How the Venezuela Operation Unfolded
item.description: "Failure of one component of this well-oiled machine would have endangered the entire mission," Gen. Dan Caine said of Operation Absolute Resolve.
